subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Gyorgy Kolonics of Hungary, a gold medalist in canoeing at the 1996 and 2000 Olympics, died Tuesday after collapsing while training for the Beijing Games, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Gyorgy Kolonics of Hungary, a gold medalist in canoeing at the 1996 and 2000 Olympics, died Tuesday after collapsing while training for the Beijing Games, The Associated Press reported.
